subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: [Call for QS ... voting in January] - Peter's revised proposal
msgSnippet: ... Okay. I didn t realize you had extended the voting a month. Yes, I need to update my proposal to include the two alternative letters, and I will do that as
messageBody:
Ted Larson Freeman wrote:
>
>
> Why be so pessimistic, Paul? We've lengthened the time frame, with
> January for collecting, discussing and refining proposals. Voting
> won't be until February. Let's wait and see how many people vote. As
> to fairness, I think we should just use the 'Polls' feature on the
> group website and see what we get. Unless it's a tie, it's fair.
>

Okay. I didn't realize you had extended the voting a month. Yes, I need
to update my proposal to include the two alternative letters, and I will
do that as soon as I can. I agree, it's better to have some standard here.

Paul
